messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org, dvyukov@google.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=561915656ed6 ***

updates: append(y,[]byte(z)...) -> append(y,z...)"

(more are possible but omitted for now as they are part of
specific tests where rather than changing what is there we
should probably expand the tests to cover the new case)

R=rsc, dvyukov
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5247058

Committer: Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org>
